title: can someone explain to me why illoai only had one ad item and had over 300 ad.
body: yes my team got our ass kicked by her but its a genuine question why did she have over 300 ad with only deaths dance as a damage item when i had 4 ad items and my ad was only above hers by a few points. is it her runes? natural scaling? some hidden passive im missing? seriously im just really confused.

replies.body: How long was the match, because Gathering Storm can get pretty crazy.

> [{quoted}](name=DrCyanide,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=up82XE37,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-06-08T00:21:48.905+0000)
>
> How long was the match, because Gathering Storm can get pretty crazy.

34 minutes, so probably

That feels too early for Gathering Storm alone to me. Lets take a closer look.

... yeah, no dice on the Runes. She had Kleptomancy, Magical Footwear, Biscuit Delivery, Cosmic Insight, Sudden Impact (which would give her Lethality, not AD) and Ravenous Hunter (which would heal her). The match history says the potions she used were all Health Potions or Elixers of Iron too.

{{champion:420}} Level 18 has 153 AD
+ {{item:3812}} 80 AD = 233 AD

Now, the {{item:3025}} proc would take her auto damage up to 386, but I don't think that shows up as AD when you click on someone.
her ad was around roughly 325 when i checked it, maybe it was ice borne but i dont know it just seems really confusing to me.

well level 18 illaoi is 
153 bace + 115 (or more) for deaths dance, gathering storm, rune page bonus (not sure about others).. potion adds 30 so thats 298
